body.raw:
Return true if the string in the first element of the array contains all of the letters of the string in the second element of the array.

For example, 
```js
["hello", "Hello"]
``` 
should return true because all of the letters in the second string are present in the first, ignoring case.

The arguments 
```js
["hello", "hey"]
``` 
should return false because the string hello does not contain a y.

Lastly, ```["Alien", "line"]```, should return true because all of the letters in line are present in Alien.
body.html:
Return true if the string in the first element of the array contains all of the letters of the string in the second element of the array.

For example,

["hello", "Hello"]

should return true because all of the letters in the second string are present in the first, ignoring case.

The arguments

["hello", "hey"]

should return false because the string hello does not contain a y.

Lastly, ["Alien", "line"], should return true because all of the letters in line are present in Alien.

body.raw:
Create a function to return true if an array of letters does not contain same letter more than one time.

For example `[’c’, ‘o’, ‘n’, ‘v’, ‘i’, ‘n’, ‘c’, ‘e’]` should return `true` and `[’b’ ,‘a’, ‘n’, ‘a’, ‘n’, ‘a’]` should return `false`

without using for loop.
body.html:
Create a function to return true if an array of letters does not contain same letter more than one time.

For example [’c’, ‘o’, ‘n’, ‘v’, ‘i’, ‘n’, ‘c’, ‘e’] should return true and [’b’ ,‘a’, ‘n’, ‘a’, ‘n’, ‘a’] should return false

without using for loop.

body.raw:
Given an array with objects of 2 fields name and age return the sum of all ages equal or above 18.


For example, 
```js
[{ name: "Person 1", age: 10 }, 
{ name: "Person 2", age: 21 },
{ name: "Person 3", age: 31 },
{ name: "Person 4", age: 1 },
{name: "Person 5", age: 61 }]
```

should return 113.
body.html:
Given an array with objects of 2 fields name and age return the sum of all ages equal or above 18.

For example,

[{ name: "Person 1", age: 10 }, 
{ name: "Person 2", age: 21 },
{ name: "Person 3", age: 31 },
{ name: "Person 4", age: 1 },
{name: "Person 5", age: 61 }]

should return 113.

body.raw:
Given an array with objects of 2 fields name and age return true if all ages equal or above 18.

 ```[{ name: "Person 1", age: 10 },{ name: "Person 2", age: 21 },{ name: "Person 3", age: 31 },{ name: "Person 4", age: 1 },{ name: "Person 5" age: 61 }]```, should return false.
body.html:
Given an array with objects of 2 fields name and age return true if all ages equal or above 18.

[{ name: "Person 1", age: 10 },{ name: "Person 2", age: 21 },{ name: "Person 3", age: 31 },{ name: "Person 4", age: 1 },{ name: "Person 5" age: 61 }], should return false.

body.raw:
Given an array of objects contain hotel name, total rating points, number of ratings return an array of objects contain hotel name and average rating value.

For example, ```[{ hotelName: "hotel 1", totalRatings: 10 , numberOfRatings: 2 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", totalRatings: 30 , numberOfRatings: 10 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", totalRatings: 40 , numberOfRatings: 10 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", totalRatings: 10 , numberOfRatings: 10 },{hotelName: "hotel 1", totalRatings: 21 , numberOfRatings: 7 }]```, 
should return ```[{ hotelName: "hotel 1", rating: 5 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", rating: 3 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", rating: 4 },{ hotelName:"hotel 1", rating: 1 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", rating: 3 }]```.
body.html:
Given an array of objects contain hotel name, total rating points, number of ratings return an array of objects contain hotel name and average rating value.

For example, [{ hotelName: "hotel 1", totalRatings: 10 , numberOfRatings: 2 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", totalRatings: 30 , numberOfRatings: 10 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", totalRatings: 40 , numberOfRatings: 10 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", totalRatings: 10 , numberOfRatings: 10 },{hotelName: "hotel 1", totalRatings: 21 , numberOfRatings: 7 }], should return [{ hotelName: "hotel 1", rating: 5 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", rating: 3 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", rating: 4 },{ hotelName:"hotel 1", rating: 1 },{ hotelName: "hotel 1", rating: 3 }].
